user.title: Set up Meteoblue Weather
user.description: Enter your Meteoblue API key and location information. If you don't have an API key, contact [email protected] to request one.

data_description.name: Name for this weather location
data_description.latitude: Latitude coordinate (leave empty to use Home Assistant's location)
data_description.longitude: Longitude coordinate (leave empty to use Home Assistant's location)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Meteoblue API. Please check your API key and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid API key. Please check your credentials.

init.title: Meteoblue Weather Options
init.description: Configure additional options for Meteoblue Weather integration.

data_description.forecast_days: Number of forecast days to retrieve (1-7)
data_description.enable_air_quality: Create air quality entity with PM2.5, PM10, O3, NO2, SO2, and CO sensors
data_description.enable_additional_sensors: Create additional sensor entities for UV index, precipitation probability, etc.
